name: modularization
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the design or production of something in separate sections: We need better modularization because at the moment you need to install the whole browser to be able to use the widget.
education
  specialized the design of an educational course as a series of modules (= separate units) that can be combined in different ways: The article examines how learning outcomes are affected by modularization.
